org.opends.server.util

Class BuildVersion

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opends.server.util.BuildVersion
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<BuildVersion>

    @PublicAPI(stability=VOLATILE,
           mayInstantiate=false,
           mayExtend=false,
           mayInvoke=true)
public final class BuildVersion
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<BuildVersion>
    Represents a particular version of OpenDJ useful for making comparisons between versions.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BuildVersion(int major, int minor, int point, long rev)
      Creates a new build version using the provided version information.

                                    throws InitializationException

      • checkVersionMismatch

        public static void checkVersionMismatch()
                                 throws InitializationException
        Checks if the binary version is the same than the instance version.
        Throws:
        InitializationException - Sends an exception if the version mismatch.

      • valueOf

        public static BuildVersion valueOf(java.lang.String s)
                            throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Parses the string argument as a build version. The string must be of the form: 
         major.minor.point.rev
        Parameters:
        s - The string to be parsed as a build version.
        Returns:
        The parsed build version.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the string does not contain a parsable build version.
